bisq.core.dao.node.full.network

Class FullNodeNetworkService

  • java.lang.Object
    • bisq.core.dao.node.full.network.FullNodeNetworkService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bisq.network.p2p.network.MessageListener, bisq.network.p2p.peers.PeerManager.Listener

    public class FullNodeNetworkService
extends java.lang.Object
implements bisq.network.p2p.network.MessageListener, bisq.network.p2p.peers.PeerManager.Listener
    Responsible for handling requests for BSQ blocks from lite nodes and for broadcasting new blocks to the P2P network.
